 2000-00722000-02-010,  FIN,  ,  , 
PrecisApproval of the re-appointment by the Minister of Finance of KIT CHAN, of Calgary, Alberta, as a director of the Board of Directors of the Bank of Canada to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years, effective March 1, 2000.
